data.name: Rivalry warlord Sengoku
data.detailed_description:
Sengoku era ... Nobunaga Oda, Shingen Takeda, Kenshin Uesugi ... This era is a group of heroes.
You will be one of this era and will play as a daimyo or a vassal.
In this game, not only the enemy and the ally, you do not know "whether the other party trusts you" or "whether the other party is a trustworthy person".
You need to make your own judgment and keep up with each other.
Strategy, tactics, domestic affairs, diplomacy, plots, tactics ... Let's aim for success and unification of the Sengoku by using everything that can be possessed.

Turn-based Sengoku simulation game!
In addition to 100 unique warlords, warlords are automatically generated and will not be exhausted.

data.short_description: A turn-based Sengoku simulation game that can be played by vassal!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 2 core, 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT430(1GB)以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
